objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalSplit' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#6A0DAD'/><stop offset='49%' stop-color='#8A2BE2'/><stop offset='51%' stop-color='#6BD3FF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#87CEEB'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalSplit)'/><g fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='.15'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='20'/><circle cx='300' cy='150' r='15'/><circle cx='150' cy='300' r='25'/><circle cx='400' cy='250' r='18'/><circle cx='250' cy='400' r='22'/><circle cx='500' cy='350' r='12'/><circle cx='350' cy='500' r='28'/><circle cx='600' cy='450' r='15'/><circle cx='450' cy='600' r='20'/><circle cx='700' cy='550' r='25'/><circle cx='550' cy='700' r='18'/><circle cx='800' cy='650' r='22'/><circle cx='650' cy='800' r='12'/><circle cx='900' cy='750' r='28'/><circle cx='750' cy='900' r='15'/><circle cx='950' cy='850' r='20'/><circle cx='850' cy='950' r='25'/></g><g fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='.2'><circle cx='120' cy='120' r='5'/><circle cx='220' cy='130' r='6'/><circle cx='320' cy='110' r='4'/><circle cx='420' cy='140' r='7'/><circle cx='520' cy='120' r='5'/><circle cx='620' cy='160' r='8'/><circle cx='720' cy='130' r='4'/><circle cx='820' cy='170' r='6'/><circle cx='920' cy='110' r='5'/><circle cx='130' cy='220' r='8'/><circle cx='230' cy='240' r='4'/><circle cx='330' cy='210' r='6'/><circle cx='430' cy='250' r='5'/><circle cx='530' cy='230' r='7'/><circle cx='630' cy='260' r='4'/><circle cx='730' cy='220' r='6'/><circle cx='830' cy='270' r='5'/><circle cx='930' cy='240' r='8'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
✓ Biggest & Brightest Bubbles
✓ Non-Toxic & Safe for Kids
✓ Eco-Friendly Formula
✓ Hours of Bubble Fun

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a dynamic diagonal split background with a gradient transition from rich purple to sky blue, lightly embellished by semi-transparent bubble graphics to emphasize a playful theme. The product image ("product_image") is prominently positioned on the right side, showcasing a large, colorful bottle of bubble solution. Bold text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") sit at the top left, using bright yellow and neon green for eye-catching emphasis. The white tagline ("tagline") below them communicates product quality, followed by a detailed specifications list ("description") and usage info ("product_details"). The price ("price") is dramatically highlighted in bold yellow, complemented with a neon green rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button_background") labeled by purple text ("cta") reading “Buy Now”. The overall composition effectively balances color, imagery, and informative text to attract parents and young audiences.

**Color Palette:**
- Purple (#6A0DAD, #8A2BE2)
- Sky Blue (#6BD3FF, #87CEEB)
- Neon Yellow (#FFFF00)
- Neon Green (#7FFF00)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- CTA Text Purple (#6A0DAD)
product_color: The product image showcases a playful and vibrant color palette ideal for children's advertising. Dominant colors include vivid lime green (#7CFF6B) for the liquid, bright yellow (#FFD700) and red (#FF2D2D) for the “BUBBLES” label, and a deep purple (#8E44AD) for the cap and background label. The word “Gazillion” features a gradient blend of light green (#C6FF00) and deeper greens (#32CD32), outlined with bold yellow and orange (#FFA500). Soft blues (#ADD8E6) and bubble highlights in white (#FFFFFF) create a fun, effervescent effect. The colors are well-blended through shadows and outlines, ensuring contrast while making each element pop.
